solution_line_template: If the number of candles in the bedroom is twice the number in the living room, there are {bedroom_candles}/{twice_factor} = <<{bedroom_candles}/{twice_factor}={living_room_candles}>>{living_room_candles} candles in the living room.

When Donovan brings in {donovan_candles} more candles, the total number of candles becomes {living_room_candles}+{bedroom_candles}+{donovan_candles} = <<{living_room_candles}+{bedroom_candles}+{donovan_candles}={total_candles}>>{total_candles}
